alert.note: Alert for Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:54PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN TEXAS COUNTY... At 153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Houston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Licking, Houston, Huggins, Plato, Roby, Bucyrus, Hazelton, Prescott, Success and Bendavis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
